Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

sometime in the past for an earlier version of KSP (I think it was 1.8 or 1.9) I had a mod (package) that included radial attachment points in the structural section similar to the BZ-52 Radial Attachment Point. I have been on the Spaceport up and down and back, I just can't find the mod pack anymore, which included them . They had a black design with a yellowish/orange ring on them I believe and came in a 0.625m, 1.25m, 2.5m and 3.75m version (not sure about the last one).

If anyone can help me find them again, I'd be eternally greatful .

Thanks in advance for your help,

Tenshi Ryu.

Edited August 11, 2013 by TenshiRyu
addition to the info
Sounds like the Spherical Fuel Tanks mod attachment points.
YES! That's it . You're awesome Frederf!!!! Thank you .
